title: Global 2D Gesture Recognition Market Trend, Growth and Research Report 2015-2019: Radiant Insights,
text: Global 2D Gesture Recognition Market Trend, Growth and Research Report 2015-2019: Radiant Insights, 2D Gesture Recognition Market United States, 30 September 2015 -- 2D gesture recognition technology can be integrated into any device that has a 2D camera, which makes them very cost-effective.2D gesture recognition technology can be integrated into any device that has a 2D camera, which makes them very cost-effective. Technavio's analysts forecast the global 2D gesture recognition market in consumer electronics to grow at a CAGR of 20.9% the period 2014-2019. Covered in this Report Technavio's report, Global 2D Gesture Recognition Market in Consumer Electronics 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the Americas, APAC, and EMEA; it also covers the landscape of the global 2D gesture recognition market in consumer electronics and its growth prospects in the coming years. View Full Report with TOC @ http://www.radiantinsights.com/research/global-2d-gesture-recognition-market-for-consumer-electronics-2015-2019 The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market.
